comments:
I right clicked on a JSP file and the Open As > EMF XML option is enabled. When
I click on it, the editor doesn't open and the following error appears:

The ecore editor is now using the infrastructure provided to implement http://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=139533.

The changes are committed to CVS.
The fix is available in the I200605041055 built.
